participant_1.background:
I won a golf trophy in a tournament when I was 10 years old.
britney spears is a wonderful singer who really touches me.
i drink a lot of apple martinis when i get a girls night out.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.
I like to drive my car to new places and explore.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my ability to cook vegan food that even meat-eaters would love.
our class is planning a trip to japan.
I will be considerate of others by keeping my music down and not disturbing them.
i have six brothers.
I am content with my simple life, but I do miss the occasional social interaction.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I am planning a trip to Japan with my class.
That sounds exciting! I have always wanted to go to Japan.
I am really excited too. I have been learning about Japanese culture and history in my classes.
What have you learned so far?
I have learned about the different types of food, the history of the country, and the different religions.
That sounds interesting. I would love to learn more about Japanese culture.
I am sure you would. It is a very interesting culture.
What are some of your favorite things about Japanese culture?
I love the food and the history. I also love the way that the Japanese people are so respectful of each other.
That's great. I am sure you will have a great time on your trip.
Do you have any other plans for the day?
Not really. I am just going to relax and enjoy the day.
That sounds like a good plan. I am going to do the same thing.
